text:
Lenya ships with an old version of commons-io, this causes
problems at runtime for example when saving a document from
within BXE.

I think this jar file can be removed.
creator: gregor.imboden@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 17396
Replaces commons-io-1.0.jar with commons-io-1.1.jar

The commons-io-1.1.jar can be found in the Cocoon sources:
lib/core/commons-io-1.1.jar
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text: Prevents successful saving a document in BXE.

I have removed the 1.0 version from Lenya

Thanks

Michi
creator: michi@apache.org
